document.full_text: new jersey must provide about $500 million for its poorer school districts next year, the state supreme court said on tuesday, complicating the state's ongoing budget negotiations.
document.title: new jersey must give poor schools $500 million: supreme court
lines_and_colors: new jersey must provide about $500 million for its poorer school districts next year, the state supreme court said on tuesday, complicating the state's ongoing budget negotiations.
